zhihao_1_intro: ^I dunno what to say about myself cos my life not very interesting, lol.
^I’m 18, I go to the same JC as Gavin. At first I wanted poly cos got all the chiobus there, and Aman is there also.
^Me and Aman stay on the same floor since P1. The whole floor only got both of us same age, so bo pian lor-- like or don’t like end up only can disturb each other, haha.
^Anyway, end up I go JC. Pa always wanted that for me cos then I got better chance to go uni.
^Two years ago, he passed away. The whole world came: His friends, his colleagues, his ex boss current boss all came to the wake. All say he was a damn solid guy. A star worker.
^They won’t get Pa this type of person again.
^But Pa always used to tell me, be your own boss is best.
^So I started my own business. I do game streaming on Twitch, now got almost 1K viewers. Tipping page all I also have. I set up on StreamXclusive, so when my viewers are happy they donate.
^Guess what. Lots of them are happy. Hah. The money is good and getting better and better.

^Last month right, I diam-diam pay off all the bills, buy the groceries for dinner – yah, I know how to choose these things, okay. The kailan, the sotong, all I pick sibeh fresh one. Ma got a shock, hah!
^Swee, man. It’s not much lah but you go ask my friends -- see if any of them can pay their house bills.
^It’s really not hard. The house only got me and Ma. Every night she will light one joss stick for Pa. And every night, I work on my business.
^So that’s my life lor. I’m Zhihao.
^And this is what it's like, to be me.
zhihao_1_1_narration: ^Ma and I are on the way to my uncles' place for Chinese New Year lunch. I really buay tahan (cannot stand) them.
zhihao_1_1: ^Bai nian (greet them 'Happy New Year') to them for what. Bai nian also got nothing to say.
^Cannot say like that. Pa won't be happy.
^People want to louhei (a celebration activity for Chinese New Year) you think they wait for you ah.
^Aiyah, Ma cannot anyhow leave early. If office need to OT then I bo pian (no choice) have to OT mah. Later other people see me leave, confirm not happy will make noise one.
^We not just late, we kan pua (damn) late - got difference hor.
^Oi. First hor, you say don’t want to see your uncles. Now you scared we late. You flipping prata ah, Boy?

s: ^Why you always like to be late?
^If Pa were here, we won’t be late.

c-0: ^Orh, so Ma’s fault lah? Want to geh kiang (act smart) point finger you ask yourself, just now whose earphones lost ah?
^And lost that time who help you find?
^I put them on the table hor. You the one anyhow pack, ownself forget pack where.
^Who teach you to talk to me like that? No respect for your elders!
^I never even ask you to say thank you, you still want to talk back. Since when you become like this? Since when I teach you until like that?
c-1: ^Ah shit. I shoot my mouth too fast.
^She looking at me liao. I better not look back.
^You want to get out of the car?
^You think I forget he not here issit?

^Not say I anyhow want to be late, okay. Just now I no choice got to OT, not like you like that, earphones anyhow throw end up come back still need to help you find. Find already you still talk to me like that.
^Don’t want to talk to you already, lah.
^Die already easy to say. See what people say when you still here.
c-2: ^Next time your earphones just keep in the same place. Just now if you know where you put we won’t be so late.
^I so busy already you know. Cannot always help you find your things.
g-0: ^OW. Wth I so old already she still smack me.
^People talking to you about one thing you don’t anyhow go change topic.
^Today will be a bad day. I can feel it.
^I know Ma wants to say something. But she won’t. Always like that.
^Faster help Ma take the orange from the boot.
^Haiyah just now you say we late already now still want to kaopei (kick up a fuss) car senget. Later you want your uncles to kaopei also issit? Faster go out take out the orange!

zhihao_1_2_narration: ^At Ji Gu’s (1st Uncle’s) house for Chinese New Year. Dua Gu (2nd Uncle) is here too.
zhihao_1_2: ^Wah. Skip CNY one year, now dunno who is called what.
^Ji Gu! Dua Gu! Xin nian kuai le! (1st Uncle! 2nd Uncle ! Happy New Year!)
^Wah! Ah Hah ah! Xin nian kuai le! Now you become so tall and handsome!
^Ah Hao! Everyone missed you! Every year hide at home thinkthinkthink not good for your mind, you know?
^Lol, I wanna hide also nowhere to hide.
^Come, come, go eat the food. No need shy.
^Last year, me and Ma had to skip CNY. When Pa passed away, we didn’t celebrate anything with anyone.
^Supposed to be three years cannot celebrate, but I think if we three years don’t go, end up forever won’t go.  So this year – second year – we just go lor.
^Yah, everybody know nobody want to say, but every extended family got one ji shi (cornerstone) to hold everything together. Pa was that ji shi.
^No ji shi, no house. Without Pa, we cannot connect.
^Aiyah I better eat this first. Eat no need to talk.
^Swee. Can take all the crackers for myself.
^Not like got cousin want to fight me for this.
^Hope nobody asks me anything if I keep eating.
^Wah lao eh, Dua Gu looking at me liao.
^Must study hard hor, Ah Hao. Make your Pa proud.
^You hear Dua Gu anot? Don't play so much computer. Everytime hide in your room play game, play until forget all your friends already.
^Nowadays got this thing called Internet, people can log on and talk to each other.
^Not good you know! Must go out more.
^Wah, Ah Hao so guai ah! Nowadays young people don’t follow their mother go temple one.
^No, no. He help his friend at the Indian temple. Good boy, that Aman.
^Why your friend take you go Indian temple?
^Sick must go see doctor, pray no use one!
^Haiyah you don’t talk anymore lah! Ah Hao, your friend Indian, correct?
^Wah. First time I hear. You always follow your friends issit?
^Wtf is he trying to say? That I dunno how to use my brain?
^Not say I follow. Friends must help each other lah.
^Help each other is good!  Ah Hao hen guai. (Ah Hao is a very good boy.)
^To Dua Gu everything also good. Jiak sai (eat shit) also good. Dua Gu, you good this, good that, end up all your words also sai ah!
^Ah Hao, you work at the temple, the pay okay anot? I worry about you, you know. If not enough Ji Gu can help you find better job. Easy one.
^It’s not work, I just help my friend pack donations for charity.
^Why you waste time!  Ji Gu teach you.
^Lai liao his nonsense lai liao. (Here he comes with his nonsense.)
^When you young that time must learn to make money!
^All your friends, they study so much go uni but then come out all dunno how to make money.
^My son, ah, he play computer can earn money, you know! Last month he pay off the utility bills. I want to pay also cannot ah!
^Ah Hao, you tell your uncles about your computer. Ma dunno how to explain this kind of thing.

s: ^Smart Ma, smart. Earlier what you say about about my gaming?
^This kind of virtual thing how to make them understand?
^Dunno what Ji Gu will say if I explain. Aiyah forget it lah.

c-0: ^I show people how I play the games and I teach them how to win.
^Got a lot of players want to be my students or followers, so business is good.
c-1: ^I just teach people how to win games and they pay me lor.
c-2: ^No lah not say I really make money.

zhihao_1_2a: ^Wah issit? One month how much you make?

c-0: ^He thinking high or low? FML why I go shoot my mouth.
^Maybe four or five hours at night. Cos in the day I got school.
^Mei shi lah, Ji Gu. (It’s not an issue lah, Ji Gu.)
c-1: ^ Around $2000. Sometimes can go up to $3000.
^He’d better say it’s good money. Cos it’s good money... I think.
^If one month $0 then another month $3000 means your income very unstable!
^Like that very hard to plan your life. And you got school also.
^You say until like that ah, doesn’t sound like a stable job leh.
^You one week work how long? Every week the same anot?
^Most days are the same, but it’s up to me.
^So actually you can work more, lah. But because you still studying you cannot, right?
^Eh, Ah Mei! You want your son to work or study?
^Tsk, of course his studies come first. He can do both, he’s okay.
^Not good lah. If he must concentrate on school, you must find passive income.
^Mei shi lah, Ji Gu. (It’s not an issue lah, Ji Gu.)
c-2: ^Maybe four or five hours at night. Cos in the day I got school.
^Wah, nowadays one income very difficult one.
^Ma looking at me liao. Bo pian lah, Ma. If I talk more about my game business he’ll start trying to give me crap advice.

zhihao_1_2b: ^Aiyah, if like that ah, better rent out your place. Rent to two or three tenant lah. Like that money and time both also have.
^Our other room cannot put two people.
^Then take the biggest room lah! Ah Mei, master bedroom ho boh? (Ah Mei, is the master bedroom okay?)
^You take the smaller room, Ah Hao take his own room… bo boon dueh (no problem/ problem solved) lor!
^I want to tell her don’t waste time reply. That we can give excuse and zao.
^But then ah, I also want to punch him. Punch then zao. This guy sibeh kiam pa [asking to be beaten up] sia.
^Pa, I’m trying lah. I’m really trying.
^Ah Mei, if you don’t want to rent out is okay one. Renting not easy also.
^Good, Dua Gu feels bad about it.
^If you and your Ma want to rent your place, best you rent only to the Singaporean Chinese. Safest.
^You ask Ji Gu what happened, that time he rent his place to the foreigner. What country he from ah, Ji Gu?
^Country ah? India or Pakistan-- haiyah I can’t remember. Wah, that time I rent to him cos he promised to pay 20 percent more.
^Uncle that time kum gong (stupid)-- all my friends got warn me, never rent to foreigners cos they give a lot of headache. But I kum gong lor, only listen to the money.
^I tell him, okay, you can go everywhere, you can use everything, just cannot do cooking, cannot bring your friend stay overnight. He say to me, “Okay boss”, shake my hand.
^Then ah, not even one week-- lucky Ji Gu come back from work early--  wah, he go and hold party ah! I see the house so messy and the smell like spoiled food like that.
^That’s why we cannot trust foreigners. Not say Uncle want to criticise them, but is the truth.
^As long as they only do light cooking, like cook Maggie Mee, I’m okay. But if cook curry or use the oven then of course different lah.
^We where got oven. Also hor, don’t say other people cook curry. You also cook curry lor.
^I cook curry is not every day, okay!
^Aman’s mother make you the curry you still eat right.
^Aman is different. I know his mother so long, of course we exchange food.
^So if Aman’s mother rents our place, you’ll let her cook curry?
^You don’t mei da mei xiao (don't be cheeky) lah, boy.
^Your friend different! Singaporean Indian different. I’m saying the Indian Indians. Their culture too different from ours already. Cannot mix. You add fire and water together what happen, I ask you?
^Wah piang he really wait for me to answer.

^And they very hao lian (arrogant), you know. You think they see your friend as equal? They look down on Singaporean Indians like him. You don’t believe you can ask your friend – he got mix with the Indian-Indians anot?
^Of course not lah. I see this kind of thing so many years already. They won’t change one.
^Ah Hao, you still young, so must be careful what type of friend you help. Cannot suka suka (anyhow) trust anybody hor – don’t anyhow listen to Dua Gu.
^Remain polite and subtly refute Ji Gu.

c-0: ^ It’s okay lah, Ji Gu. I trust Aman with my life.
^But listen to me. Ji Gu is sixty years old liao, everything I also see already.
^What I tell you is the truth. And sometimes the truth is ugly.
c-1: ^  Ji Gu, I trust Aman. But Pa said sometimes cannot trust family to take care of us even when we are in need.
^OI! Ni bi zui ah, ni!  (You shut your mouth, ah, you!)
^Hahaha. Ah Hao is growing up fast.
^Ah Mei, don’t have to scold him. Boys are boys.
^He winked at me. Ugh. Forget it.
c-2: ^Maybe you don’t agree. But one day you’ll understand why I say this.
^Trust no one. Only look out for yourself.
^Wah lao he zim lor sor (very long-winded).

zhihao_1_3: ^Halfway back from the toilet, I heard Ma and Ji Gu arguing. So I stopped and listened.
^I make sure they never see me, and I heard everything.
^Whenever they speak only Hokkien, it’s always something bad. Bad and complicated. They think I don't understand, but obv I can.
^Didn’t you just say you don’t want to rent out your place? That means you have one extra room. Why Ba cannot stay with you?
^Do we need to discuss this now?
^Let’s not run away from the problem.
^The old folks’ home just restructured their fees and the subsidy brackets this month. I’ve always been very straight with you: $400 is the most I can afford. Our brother can only give $200.
^You’re telling me now you can afford the extra $450 to keep Ba there?
^Wtf, Ah Gong’s home fees increase so much? Why Ma always never tell me this kind of thing?
^I cannot say out loud, but I really dunno how it’s fair that Ah Gong is still here when his soul is long gone. Zero dignity.
^I can’t remember when Ah Gong stopped talking. But I remember our last convo.
^He thought I stole his comb so he threw his cup at me. His baby sip-cup. Then he screamed and called me names. And then he cried and cried and cried.
^He cannot talk anymore. He cannot walk anymore. He cannot eat anymore. He should have died long ago.
^I wish he died and not Pa.
^Why can’t Ba stay with you? You stay by yourself, you have three rooms.
^I have to travel to JB every two weeks for work, how’d you expect me to care for Ah Gong?
^We can all chip in for a maid –

^Siao ah! How is a maid trained to treat his bedsores, give him his insulin shots? And you think they’re okay with changing his diapers? Even the nurses complain he always fights them off and scratches them.
^Remember what I said about trust. Don’t ever trust maids to be left alone with  Ah Gong.
^I’m so busy already juggling a job and a kid. You know it.

b: ^Then what? You want your son to chip in too? He’s still in school!
^Don’t forget, you have to declare your son’s income if you want him to help.
^If it goes over the income cap, we lose our subsidy.
^Then what? You want your son to chip in too? He’s still in school!
^Don’t forget, you have to declare your son’s income if you want him to help.
^If it goes over the income cap, we lose our subsidy.
^Your son just said he isn’t earning a stable income. And he’s still a student. How is it fair on him to shoulder the fees?
^Stupid. Why did I go bluff him about my income.
^Your son said he isn’t even earning yet. You want him to stop focusing on his studies to look for a job? That’s selfish to the boy right?
^Stupid. Why did I go bluff him about my income.

zhihao_1_3: ^I’ll think of something. Don’t bring my son into this.
^It’s doable for me if I go pro. I'm almost good enough already.
^I just need to push myself harder.
zhihao_1_4_narration: ^When I’m not streaming, I'm playing every night. I play this first-person shooter game called Alphas.
^It's a multiplayer game so I team up with other players. Also got high-skill ceiling so I don’t have limits on improving.
^Last time I always play with Gavin and Aman. Gavin I met on Discord first, then we found out we’re from the same JC.
^After that right, we always eat bak chor mee (minced pork noodles) together when we got same tutorial break.
^He eat so much until his IGN (in-game name) also become ‘bakchormee’, lol.
^Now I can’t remember how long ago all of us played together.
^But if you don't ask then you also don’t know right?

zhihao_2_2: ^The whole week I everyday also practise. During tutorial break I play until next class. Never talk to my friends at all.
^Today I wake up super early for the tryouts. The whole morning can only feel kan cheong (nervous)
^Sigh, but no point. Ma is late. As usual.
^I really never learn leh. If Ma wants to fetch me and I say okay, then no matter what, I WILL be late. No matter how much extra time ahead I give.
^Ma: Ah Boy, ten minutes away only!
^If she say ten means twenty. Opposite of Pa.
^Eh Ma, nevermind lah. I take taxi.
^I driving now. Fifteen min only. You wait hor!
^Wahlao eh, Ma! Ten or fifteen? No need come la, I book taxi liao
^Wah piang, the Grab also take ten minutes. Like that how to reach on time sia?
^10 minutes later, both Ma and the taxi arrived at the same time.
^Even though I tell her already don't come! Tsk!
^Ah, Mister! Mister! I can fetch my son-- nevermind! Like that you can fetch other people. Thank you ah, thank you!
^You want to go to your mother’s car? It’s okay. You pay already anyway.

zhihao_2_2a: ^Mah drive sibeh (very) slow. Wah piang she give me so much headache!
^Faster lah, Ah Boy! Wait late already.
^How come the window cannot go down?
^Uncle, can help wind down the window?
^Ma! No need, I pay already… No lah I need to go now.
^Uncle, can drive on please? You can wind up the window now. Thanks.
^Haiz. I look at Ma’s face I feel bad already.
^20 minutes later, I arrived just in time at the Alphas try-outs venue.
^Woah. The place looks cool. Where’s the registration?
^Hey there! I’m Ian. You’re here for the tryouts, right?
^You're a bit early but that’s alright. Just find a seat around and relax. We'll begin the matches once more candidates arrive.
zhihao_2_2b: ^Quick lah! Come in to the car.
^Sorry, Uncle. I take my mother's car.
^It's ok boy. You paid already anyway.
^I drive very fast already! Wait accident then you know.
^Wah lao confirm late liao. Confirm plus chop.
^35 minutes later, I arrived late at the Alphas try-outs venue.
^Shit. The whole place so rojak (mixed up). I cannot even find where to register.
^Hey there! Tryouts are this way. Are you Zhihao?
^No, no. It’s alright! We’ve only just started.
^I’m Ian. Glad you could make it.
^Let’s get you to your assigned team and find you a seat.

zhihao_2_3: ^The Alphas tryout is about to start.
^Wah. The set-up here power. Not like my one.
^But I prep until close eyes can win. Why I feel so kan cheong?
^No time to kan cheong liao, must stay in comms all the way.
^I cannot lose control of my team, like that time during my stream session.
^You're Ah-hao right? Your IGN (in-game name), at least.

s: ^Yah, I'm the one and only ahao_gamer!

c-0: ^Wah piang. This one jiak kantang sia.
^Funny fella. He wanna wait for me to say what?
c-1: ^Yah, I’m the one and only Ahao. Haha.
^I see. And how may I address you? Just Ah-hao?
^Oh. Uh, my real name is Zhihao.
g-0: ^Alexander here. But my gamertag is Crash.
^If it’s a tongue-twister for you, just call me Alex, yeah?
^Alright people! You're going to be scrimming against another group of players in the other room. So get ready as a team, steady those nerves and, most importantly, have fun! All the best!
^Fellas. We're gonna own them. Use your wits, go all out, be brutal!

c-2: ^ He wanna be boss issit. Extra sia.
^I see what else he say first.
^Come on, let’s start. Zhihao, what’s up? You’re looking constipated.
^Wtf is his problem? Look at me macam wanna fight.
^He stare one more time I’ll smack his face sia, shut his ang moh mouth.
^So how do you propose we do it?
^We need to see the other team first.
c-3: ^ I need to talk more in comms. Sekali this ang moh pai (Western-sounding person) wanna be boss.
^Eh guys, first we must think of a strategy. So if we look at the other team right--
^Why his face like not happy like that?
^So why’re you taking the lead before everyone’s introduced themselves?
^Then why are you ordering everyone about?
^Nevermind. I’m not gonna waste time and start a fight. If you wanna continue staring at me instead of gaming, I’ll be happy to let the panel know.
^But we’re starting the game now, cannot anyhow lose focus.

g-1: ^First level is abandoned city. Steady. I know this one by heart.
^Charge out using a trick you learned on youtube

c-4: ^Sweet, man! Didn't know you could do that.
^Not difficult lah. I learn from Youtube one.
^Why everybody down here jiak kantang (speaks with a Western accent).
^Haha can teach you later if you want.
^How I talk versus how they all talk -- I sound like alien sia.
c-5: ^Guys let’s group up, take the high ground first.
^Why everybody down here jiak kantang one  (speaks with a Western accent).

g-2: ^Ok, let's gooooo... What the.. DAMNIT. Some idiot sniped me! Where the fish was he hiding?!

c-6: ^There’s no time. We have to move on!
^If I don’t heal we confirm lose--
c-7: ^Eh sorry guys. I better hang back, my character wounded.
^Zhihao, if you’re out you’re out. Stop interrupting everyone by apologising.

g-3: ^Jialat, my team getting whacked by that sniper. I think I know where he's hiding.
^ALPHAS: BLUE team is losing. 3 minutes left.
^Must tell them or not? Dunno if I tell them then end up scolded again for distracting them.

c-8: ^ALPHAS: ALEX is killed by a headshot from RED team.
^Wahlao eh! I say already he never hear.
^Now he mati (died) the whole team also mati.
^I say got sniper you never hear issit!
^I heard you. I couldn’t understand you.
^The next two fights do not go smoothly. My BLUE team is losing.
^But I dunno, like damn hard to talk with this team. They jiak kantang (speak like Westerners) until cannot click.
^Especially that Alex. Everytime want tekan (tease/punish) me.
^But now I don’t feel good about my skills.
c-9: ^The sniper quite obvious, should be they all can see.
^ALPHAS: ALEX is killed by a headshot from RED team.
^Ahao! You were in front and encountered him earlier! You could have told us where he was!
^Shit. Got no Alex the whole team confirm lose liao.
^The next two fights do not go smoothly. My BLUE team is losing.
^I dunno what happen to me. Usually in comms I talk a lot. Now I feel like I always say the wrong thing.

g-4: ^Ok, this is our last chance to prove ourselves.
^Now we must beat everyone in the other team to win.
^I think still can… if we clutch.

c-10: ^ Ok, I'm going to ult in three. I need cover fire.
^Zhihao flanks and uses his ultimate (special weapon), wiping the enemy team.
c-11: ^ZHIHAO flanks and uses his ultimate  (special weapon), yet he is immediately stunned and eliminated.
^I’ve never bowed out of a game that fast.
^It’s alright man, we’ve got more games coming up.
^The first game always sets the tone. Pity it was beyond my control.

zhihao_2_4: ^I think we could have done better with a different team.
^Nope. Sometimes I'm not sure what you're saying.
^This fella damn qian bian (asking for a beating). If he got problem with me don’t have to hide and give fake reason.
^Scratch that. Most times I don’t get what you’re saying. You need to learn how to talk properly. It cost us certain fights.
^Yeah. Zhihao, it’s cool. We’re all good.
^Yah yah the whole team all good. I’m not.

c-0: ^Why the heck should I say it?
^There you go, that’s your stupid-ass name.
c-1: ^ Oi Alex. Every fight, you’re the first one to die. Cos you keep feeding them ult charge.
^If I talk until so cham, how come everybody else can understand me except you?
^I think you really cannot make it lah. Cannot only do things one by one. By the time you take action after people give instructions you die liao.
g-0: ^The reality is, you're just a content creator. You give a lot of opinions. That’s the easy part.
^But you don’t play a good game-- you either give instructions too late or give unimportant ones. And that’s besides me struggling to make out what you’re saying.

c-2: ^ Wtf I won’t let him tell me where I stand.
^If you not there right, we confirm win every game.
^I have the same PC as this, and I'm used to it.
^I’ve watched you play and I know you use a shitty oldwood PC.
^So you say your computer so zhai also cannot help you lah.
^Better save money and sell your monitor. Cos you can’t make it as a gamer.
c-3: ^Lol people like my content. And my content got a lot of instructions.
^I don’t need to resort to that.
^No skills, no content. Your ang moh talk also fake.

g-1: ^Alright! We're going to swap players around for the next game. Excited guys?
^After the whole event, everyone had to give feedback to Ian and the panel.
^So, Zhihao! What do you think of the first team? We plan to pair you players with teammates and coaches you're comfortable with.

c-4: ^I die-die also don’t want to be on the same team as Alex.
^The whole team is okay except Alex. He got attitude problem.
^He only got problem with me cos he don’t like how I talk. But he’s the only one who complained cannot understand.
^Okay, so it’s a language barrier you’re saying?
^No lah! He just don’t like me. The language is an excuse.
^Right. Was there anything else that was problematic?
^His gaming cannot make it. But he will blame me for his mistakes. You can go ask the other players.
^I see. I’ll talk to him and get his side of things as well.
^But if that’s the case then we definitely will need to establish certain codes of conduct so players don’t get hostile with each other.
c-5: ^ Uh, better not sound like a complainer.
^I scared they think I the one got problem. Then they put me with all the cui (lousy) people.
^Uh, I think the team is not bad.
^The panel and I were observing the voice chat and I have to say, it was a bit chaotic.
^Wah piang, they spy on all the teams ah?
^We did notice some friction between you and Crash-- that’d be Alex wouldn’t it?
^If they say like that means they also know Alex damn guai lan.
^Yah. He got problem with me. I dunno why.
^We haven’t spoken with him but we definitely agree there’s some hostility there, so we’ll be setting new codes of conduct to minimise such occurrences.

g-2: ^Can continue to keep us in different teams?
^You know, it’s odd. We paired you and Alex together as we thought your personalities are similar.
^It’s a pity it’s turned out this way between you two.

zhihao_2_5: ^Wahlao, the judges blind issit? How am I like Alex! Siao.
^I just happy this round finish liao. But I think I cocked it up.
^Where’s Ma? Today Saturday got her ‘Sheng Siong Show’, she how come go out?

b: ^Aiyah but this morning she confirm angry with me.
^But she drive until so teruk (bad) how to reach the place on time.
^I better cook dinner. So she happier.
^Today if she cook, confirm cook late.
^Aiyah I cook dinner myself better lah.

zhihao_2_5: ^Shit. I so shag, forgot to buy groceries also.
^I put my bag in my room first.
^Ma! Just now I call you why you diam-diam!
^Eh? You come back already ah! Chi bao le mei you? (Eaten already?)
^Not yet. I going NTUC. Today dinner I help you cook.
^Don’t lah I go down later. Eh you help me look, which photo of the room better?
^For the property agent. She tell me take picture of the room, take one set day one set night. Dunno if take like that okay anot.
^Eh, Ma. Why you prata (flipped opinion)? That time you say you don’t want to rent out the bedroom.
^I never say don’t want mah! Bo pian need to support your Ah Gong what. Nevermind one, I can sleep in the other room.
^All of Pa’s things still here in the room. What’s she going to do? Pack them all up? Give them away?

c-0: ^ So just like that you let Pa go?
^Who say I let him go? You better watch what you say ah.
^I can pay the fees, you know.
^You keep your money for your studies. This kind of thing you don’t make into your problem. This one for me and Ji Gu to handle.
^I can pay the fee difference. You don’t chin cai move Pa’s things away.
^Ah Boy, I tell you already, you don’t action try to be hero. You think this problem I dunno how to solve issit?
^Problem you where got solve. You let strangers stay lagi big problem.
^You think carefully: This is Pa’s bed. Your bed. For twenty years.
^You still anyhow want to let strangers sleep in it?
^Bed is just bed lah! So big I one person sleep, waste space.
^Better I move to the other room, let people pay for this one.
^Then how come that time Ji Gu say this idea you angry?
^TSK. You don’t geh kiang (act nosy) lah. Talk so much.
^Why you so fast change your mind? Pa’s things must respect leh.
^If you want to respect Pa, first thing you respect is me hor.
^Buy to cook dinner lah. Just now say already.
^I go buy lah, you stay home.
^You busy taking picture how to go now.
^Wah lao, she never even ask about my tryouts.
^Everytime we talk, we end up fighting. Always over Pa.
c-1: ^ Haiz. But if I talk about Pa we confirm fight.
^The other room can cover the fees right. Why need to rent the master bedroom?
^The other room got so much barang (stuff) how to put in the bed? Smaller also. Confirm people don’t want lah.
^Our area so ulu you think people like to stay here issit? If I rent out that room will only get the funny type.
^Eh Ma, I pay the fee difference. Don’t rent out the room.
^You earn how much only! Your money you don’t end up pay for everything. Save for your uni.
^Ah Boy, I know you want to help lah, but you don’t busybody can. This problem I know how to solve.
^Wahlao, I cannot say to her face but sometimes Ma damn qian bian (annoying)
^If halfway you want to stop work just go school how?
^Next round then is the final. They haven’t select yet.
^Eh this room you don’t rent hor.
^If you get in, maybe I change to the small room.

b: ^Crap. I delete the tweet liao how come he still know?
^Crap. Must be he saw the tweet.

c-1: ^ He write like that I cannot even tell if he angry or what.
g-0: ^Dunno if he asking me this just to start the convo.
^Nahh you prob owned everyone. When will they release the results?
^Btw there’s something I need to let you know
^Hope you don’t take it the wrong way
^Jialat he wanna talk about the tweet liao.

s: ^Eh.. uh I always joke when I tweet...

g-1: ^Is Tue 2pm okay with you for the lunch? I finish tutorials by then
^Sorry I pegged down a solid date only now lol
^Thing is, I’ve asked Nadia to join us
^Wah piang why he must bring his gf. Now I become lightbulb sia.

c-4: ^But if he really want her there, very bad to say no.
^Dunno if she’ll understand me lol. School never talk that much with her.
^Don’t worry bro you’ll like talking to her
^Wouldn’t do it if I didn’t think you two would get along
^Suan le ba [Forget it.] I want also cannot change his mind.
c-5: ^If she join us will be damn paiseh
^You’ll warm up to each other, I’m sure
^She already knows Aman and they get along great
^We still can, she’ll order something else
^Then everytime we eat bakchormee she eat different food like very out
^If you feel paiseh we don’t have to eat bakchormee lol
^Haiz. That’s why my tweet is the truth.

g-2: ^Thanks man! Means a lot to me btw haha
^Hey, of the three of us, you’re the best gamer by a mile
^I dunno if cos he super religious or what, but Gavin really sibeh (damn) steady.
^He always got something good to say about people. Even if got nothing good about them, heh.
^I know if I tell him anything, he won’t judge.
^Wah seh you say me until liddat I paiseh (shy) leh
^Btw you wanted to tell me about some tweet earlier?

c-6: ^ Lol I forgot what tweet alr
^Nothing impt. Nowadays i got a lot of followers, so got too many tweets la.
^Anw excited to intro you to have you get to know Nad better
^Been waiting for it for a long time
^Sometimes, I dunno how Gavin is friends with me.
^And I dunno if he knows, but it’s a very important friendship to me. Maybe my most important friendship.
^Sometimes I’m scared we’ll drift apart. Cos Gavin already got so many good friends, now got his new gf-- he where got time for everyone?
^But of course I won’t tell him this lah, a bit malu (embarrassed) sia.
^Must show I have my shit together. I’m not a kid anymore.
c-7: ^I tweeted a lame joke abt you and bakchormee
^You’re always joking about me and bakchormee
^But  bakchormee and I are inseparable hahaha
^I don’t say this to Gavin lah, but he’s a damn important friend.
^Eating lunch with him is the best time I have in school.
^I never think of this before sia, but now he got Nadia, I dunno if he will start to pangseh our break-times.
^I try not to think about it. But buay sai (unable to stop myself) lah.
